g.text: • Multi-model resonance detection • Emergent pattern recognition
• Advanced energy field manipulation • Consciousness simulation aesthetics
Progression gates based on cumulative energy accumulation from AI interactions. Higher levels unlock advanced visualization features and multi-model capabilities.

svg.text: • Level Progression: Energy accumulation based on actual AI interactions, not arbitrary timers or XP systems
• Visual Complexity: Each level adds measurable computational load, validated against hardware tier capabilities
• Performance Scaling: 60Hz target maintained through adaptive degradation (L5→L4→L3 as needed under load)
• WVMP Compliance: All level features map to measurable metrics • Evidence Mode available at every level
Success Criteria: Users understand progression is earned through AI usage, visuals remain truthful to computation
